alert.note: Alert for Carroll (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 15 at 11:25PM CST until February 16 at 12:15AM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Carroll County in northwestern Arkansas... * Until 1215 AM CST. * At 1124 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles west of Grandview, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Berryville... Eureka Springs... Green Forest... Beaver... Urbanette... Grandview... Coin... Pleasant Ridge... Denver... Oak Hill... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
